title: Readout of Jared Kushner and Jason Greenblatt’s Meeting with the King of Jordan – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 19, 2018
Senior Advisor Jared Kushner and Special Representative for International Negotiations Jason Greenblatt returned to the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan and met today with King Abdullah II bin Al-Hussein.  Building on previous conversations, they discussed increasing cooperation between the United States and Jordan, regional issues, the humanitarian situation in Gaza, and the Trump Administration’s efforts to facilitate peace between the Israelis and Palestinians.
